name: Dreaming
description:
Dreaming is about a young girl who awaits her love in a Garden. Her man could be in a land far away, or in the layers of her inner spaces as a deity she worships - i leave it open.
She waits to be wedded to her man.

She could also be pining for Mukti, or enlightenment - a release from the mortal self and all the bondages that come with it, and the man could be an embodiment of that longing.
Dreaming is a piece that i leave open to the eye of the beholder.

Physical copies in high quality Giclée print on canvas paper will be sent on purchase.
Free Shipping within India.
7% from sales will go to support the #savesoil movement by Isha Foundation.
